definition: to send or deliver to the hospital
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send

sentences.english: Discontinue use immediately upon unusual loss of menstrual blood and seek medical advice.
sentences.chinese: 使用後若經量異常，請立即停止使用並送醫治療。

sentences.english: Because of the late Qing Ling Ding Hai, the hospital not cause miscarriage.
sentences.chinese: 由於丁海的晚歸，清苓送醫不及導致流產。

sentences.english: Seven of those injured were taken to hospital for emergency treatment.
sentences.chinese: 跳樓傷者中有7人被送醫搶救。

sentences.english: The malnourished baby was rushed to the hospital as its condition worsened.
sentences.chinese: 這位營養不足的嬰兒因爲病情惡化被緊急送醫。

sentences.english: Deng Guida was pronounced dead en route to hospital. Huang was treated for minor injuries.
sentences.chinese: 鄧貴大死在送醫途中，黃受到較少的傷害。

definition: to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
to faint/to swoon/to black out/to become unconscious
to pass (sth) on (to sb else)/to transfer sb (to another hospital etc)
to open fire/to shoot a gun
to seek medical treatment/to see a doctor
